actions.text: Amendment SA 318 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 81.

Amendment SA 318 proposed by Senator Crapo. (consideration: CR S2307-2308; text: CR S2307) To amend the reconciliation instructions to include instructions to the Committee on Finance to achieve the Budget's stated goal of $275 billion in mandatory health care savings.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 318 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 81.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 318 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 81.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 318 proposed by Senator Crapo.

purpose: To amend the reconciliation instructions to include instructions to the Committee on Finance to achieve the Budget's stated goal of $275 billion in mandatory health care savings.
